description: Adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata that can be used to manage a resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource whose tags you want to modify.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The new or modified tags for the resource. (dict) --- A set of key-value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.
